Squizzy::

She jerked and pulled her hand in as the covers went down on hte 
consoles.  She frowned. "Well you can't blame me for trying. You'd do 
the same thing if you were in my place."  She leaned back in the seat 
and hit the back of the arrow in her shoulder. She groaned and winced 
at the pain. "I'm sorry. I didn't mean to be any trouble. I just 
still feel scared. I don't where you are taking me or what is going 
to happen.  You mentioned reprogrammed? Why would you reprogram me? 
I'm fine, a little shaken, but fine." 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Dark One::
> 
> Dark One's internal scanners report Squizzy's actions, the 
Oblitercon 
> frowning. With a silent command, all the consoles in the cockpit 
are 
> deactivated, Dark One flying on.
> 
> "I'm afraid I can't let you edject," he says as panels cover the 
console, the 
> lever pulling itself down and a panel covering it as well. Dark One 
flies on, 
> a bit annoyed at the bot's actions.
